DashboardDefinitionComponents.Name: To Do
DashboardDefinitionComponents.Parameters:
[{"WidgetSubTitle":"Tickets in which you are the Executor","WidgetType":"grid","WidgetFilterField":"","WidgetColor":"","WidgetHeight":"","WidgetHeader":{"showContextInfo":false,"WidgetPeriodChooser":{"type":"year","visible":false} ,"WidgetMetrics":{"visible":true,"Metrics":[{"visible":true,"metricName":"# Delayed To Do","metricFieldValue":"DelayedToDoJobsGrandTotal"} ,{"visible":true,"metricName":"# Delayed Work in Progress","metricFieldValue":"DelayedWorkInProgressJobsGrandTotal"} ]} ,"showSubTitle":true,"showTitle":true} ,"WidgetDataSources":{"main":{"type":"querytext","value":"SELECT 
j.Oid as JobId,
j.[Name] as Job,
j.[Date],
j.[Number],
DATEDIFF(dd, j.[Date], GETDATE()) as ExpiredDays,
j.[State] as Stage,
isnull(ws.Color, wst.Color) as Color, 
cc.HasImage as ClientHasImage,
j.ClientId,
j.[User],
j.Client
FROM 
Analytics.Job(@CurrentUserId) j, CommercialClient cc, WorkflowState ws, WorkflowStateType wst
WHERE 
exists 
(
select 1
from 
Assignment ass, AssignmentType ast
where 
ass.[User] = @CurrentUserId and
ass.DocumentOid = j.Oid and
ass.AssignmentType = ast.Oid AND
ast.[Name] = 'Executor'
)
AND j.[State] NOT IN ('Done', 'Closed', 'Canceled')
AND j.ClientId = cc.Oid
AND ws.Oid = j.StateId 
and wst.Oid = ws.WorkflowStateType","mapping":""} } ,"QueryConfiguration":{} } ]

DashboardDefinitionComponents.Name: Activity Alarms
DashboardDefinitionComponents.Parameters:
[{"WidgetSubTitle":"Tickets from Client Service and Support by Stage","WidgetType":"chart","WidgetFilterField":"","WidgetColor":"#e0e0e0","WidgetHeight":0,"WidgetHeader":{"showContextInfo":false,"WidgetPeriodChooser":{"type":"year","visible":false} ,"WidgetMetrics":{"visible":true,"Metrics":[{"visible":true,"metricName":"# Requester","metricFieldValue":"DelayedRequester"} ,{"visible":true,"metricName":"# Responsible","metricFieldValue":"DelayedResponsible"} ,{"visible":true,"metricName":"# Executor","metricFieldValue":"DelayedExecutor"} ]} ,"showSubTitle":true,"showTitle":true} ,"WidgetDataSources":{"main":{"type":"querytext","value":"select  'Requester' as Requester,
        'Responsible' as Responsible,
        'Executor' as Executor,
        (select sum(iif(ast.Name = 'Requester' and AgreedDateUtc < getdate(), 1, 0))) as DelayedRequester,
        (select sum(iif(ast.Name = 'Responsible' and AgreedDateUtc < getdate(), 1, 0))) as DelayedResponsible,
        (select sum(iif(ast.Name = 'Executor' and AgreedDateUtc < getdate(), 1, 0))) as DelayedExecutor
from    Deliverable j, WorkflowState ws, WorkflowStateType wst, Department dep, Assignment ass, AssignmentType ast
where   ws.Oid = j.WorkflowState and
        wst.Oid = ws.WorkflowStateType and
        dep.Oid = j.Department and
        ass.[User]= @CurrentUserId and 
        ass.DocumentOid = j.Oid and 
        ass.AssignmentType = ast.Oid and
        ws.name not in ('Done', 'Closed', 'Closed(Unrelated)') 
        /*[DateFilter]*/ and j.AgreedDateUtc >= @FromDate and j.AgreedDateUtc <= @ToDate /*[/DateFilter]*/","mapping":""} } ,"QueryConfiguration":null} ]

DashboardDefinitionComponents.Name: Change Requests
DashboardDefinitionComponents.Parameters:
[{"WidgetSubTitle":"Change Requests requiring your Approval","WidgetType":"grid","WidgetFilterField":"","WidgetColor":"","WidgetHeight":"","WidgetHeader":{"showContextInfo":false,"WidgetPeriodChooser":{"type":"year","visible":false} ,"WidgetMetrics":{"visible":true,"Metrics":[{"visible":true,"metricName":"# Delayed To Do","metricFieldValue":"DelayedToDoJobsGrandTotal"} ,{"visible":true,"metricName":"# Delayed Work in Progress","metricFieldValue":"DelayedWorkInProgressJobsGrandTotal"} ]} ,"showSubTitle":true,"showTitle":true} ,"WidgetDataSources":{"main":{"type":"querytext","value":"
select  job.effort,
        j.NameAndExternalId as Job,
        Right(j.NameAndExternalId, (len(j.NameAndExternalId) - len(j.[Number]) - 2)) as JobName,
        j.Number as JobNumber,
        ws.Name as Stage,
        j.Project as Project,
        iif(ws.Name in ('Under Approval'), job.EntryDateUtc, job.AgreedDateUtc) as Enddate, 
        j.Oid,
        isnull(ws.Color, wst.Color) as Color,
        datediff(day, getdate(), job.AgreedDateUtc) as Days,
        j.ClientId as ClientId,
        j.Client as ClientName,
        cc.HasImage as ClientHasImage
from    [Analytics].[Job](@CurrentUserId) j, Deliverable job, WorkflowState ws, WorkflowStateType wst, CommercialClient cc
where   j.Oid = job.Oid and
		ws.Oid = j.StateId and
        wst.Oid = ws.WorkflowStateType and
		j.ClientId = cc.Oid and
        ws.name in ('Under Approval') and
        exists 
            (
            select 1
                from Assignment ass, AssignmentType ast
                where ass.[User] = @CurrentUserId and
                    ass.DocumentOid = j.Oid and
                    ass.AssignmentType = ast.Oid and
                    ast.Name = 'Responsible'
            ) and
                not exists 
            (
            select 1
                from JobItem ji
                where ji.DocumentOid = j.Oid and
                    ji.ModifiedBy = @CurrentUserId and
                    ji.DocumentTypeName = 'deliverable' and 
                    ji.GCRecord is null and
                    ji.Done = 1
            )
/*[DateFilter]*/ and job.EntryDateUtc >= @FromDate and job.EntryDateUtc <= @ToDate /*[/DateFilter]*/
order by Days Asc","mapping":""} } ,"QueryConfiguration":{} } ]

DashboardDefinitionComponents.Name: Mine Overtime View
DashboardDefinitionComponents.Parameters:
[{"WidgetSubTitle":"Closed and In Progress Tickets","WidgetType":"rangeselector","WidgetFilterField":"","WidgetColor":"#e0e0e0","WidgetHeight":0,"WidgetHeader":{"showContextInfo":false,"WidgetPeriodChooser":{"startDate":"2018/06/1","endDate":"2019/06/30","type":"year","visible":false} ,"showSubTitle":true,"showTitle":true} ,"WidgetDataSources":{"main":{"type":"querytext","value":"select  max(week) as Week,
        [WeekStart],
        iif(sum([RequestApprovall]) = 0, null, max(sum(InProgress)) over() + sum([RequestApprovall])) as [RequestApprovall],
        sum(InProgress) as InProgress,
        sum(Closed) as Closed
from (
select  max(datepart(ww, j.EntryDateUtc)) as week,
        min(cast(j.EntryDateUtc as date)) as WeekStart,
        sum(iif(ws.name = 'Under Approval', 1, 0)) as [RequestApprovall], 
0 as    InProgress,
0 as    Closed
from    Deliverable j, WorkflowState ws, WorkflowStateType wst, Department dep, Project p, CommercialClient cc
where   ws.Oid = j.WorkflowState and
        wst.Oid = ws.WorkflowStateType and
        dep.Oid = j.Department and
        j.Project = p.Oid and
        cc.Oid = j.Client and
        ws.name in ('Under Approval') and
        exists 
            (
            select 1
                from Assignment ass, AssignmentType ast
                where ass.[User] = @CurrentUserId and
                    ass.DocumentOid = j.Oid and
                    ass.AssignmentType = ast.Oid
            ) and
                not exists 
            (
            select 1
                from JobItem ji
                where ji.Job = j.Oid and
                    ji.ModifiedBy = @CurrentUserId and
                    ji.GCRecord is null and
                    ji.Done = 1
            ) and
cast    (j.EntryDateUtc as date) >= @FromDate and cast(j.EntryDateUtc as date) <= @ToDate
group by datepart(yyyy, j.EntryDateUtc), datepart(ww, j.EntryDateUtc)
union all
select  max(datepart(ww, j.AgreedDateUtc)) as week,
        min(j.AgreedDateUtc) as WeekStart,
        0 as [RequestApprovall], 
        sum(iif(ast.Name in ('Executor','Requester','Responsible'), 1, 0)) as InProgress,
        sum(iif(ws.name in ('Done', 'Closed', 'Closed(Unrelated)') and ast.Name in ('Executor', 'Requester', 'Responsible' ), 1, 0)) as Closed
from    Deliverable j, WorkflowState ws, WorkflowStateType wst, Department dep, Assignment ass, AssignmentType ast
where   ws.Oid = j.WorkflowState and
        wst.Oid = ws.WorkflowStateType and
        dep.Oid = j.Department and
        ass.[User]= @CurrentUserId and
        ass.DocumentOid = j.Oid and
        ass.AssignmentType = ast.Oid and
        j.AgreedDateUtc >= @FromDate and j.AgreedDateUtc <= @ToDate
group by datepart(yyyy, j.AgreedDateUtc), datepart(ww, j.AgreedDateUtc)
) t
group by [WeekStart]
order by [WeekStart]","mapping":""} } ,"QueryConfiguration":null} ]

DashboardDefinitionComponents.Name: Following
DashboardDefinitionComponents.Parameters:
[{"WidgetSubTitle":"Tickets where you are the Responsible or the Requester","WidgetType":"grid","WidgetFilterField":"","WidgetColor":"","WidgetHeight":"","WidgetHeader":{"showContextInfo":false,"WidgetPeriodChooser":{"type":"year","visible":false} ,"WidgetMetrics":{"visible":true,"Metrics":[{"visible":true,"metricName":"# Delayed To Do","metricFieldValue":"DelayedToDoJobsGrandTotal"} ,{"visible":true,"metricName":"#  Delayed Work in Progress","metricFieldValue":"DelayedWorkInProgressJobsGrandTotal"} ]} ,"showSubTitle":true,"showTitle":true} ,"WidgetDataSources":{"main":{"type":"querytext","value":"select j.effort,
    a.NameAndExternalId as Job,
    RIGHT(a.NameAndExternalId,(len(a.NameAndExternalId)-len(a.[Number])-2)) as JobName,
    a.Number as JobNumber,
    ws.Name as Stage,
    a.Project as Project,
    CONVERT(VARCHAR(6), j.AgreedDateUtc, 6) as Enddate,
    a.Oid,
    isnull(ws.Color, wst.Color) as Color,
    datediff(day,getdate(),AgreedDateUtc) as Days,
    sum(iif(ws.name = 'To Do' and AgreedDateUtc < getdate(), 1, 0)) over() as DelayedToDoJobsGrandTotal,
    sum(iif(ws.name = 'Work in Progress' and AgreedDateUtc < getdate(), 1, 0)) over() as DelayedWorkInProgressJobsGrandTotal,
    a.ClientId as ClientId,
    a.Client as ClientName,
    cc.HasImage as ClientHasImage
from [Analytics].[Job](@CurrentUserId) a, Deliverable j, WorkflowState ws, WorkflowStateType wst, CommercialClient cc
where ws.Oid = j.WorkflowState and
     a.Oid = j.Oid and
    wst.Oid = ws.WorkflowStateType and
    cc.Oid = j.Client and
    ws.name not in ('Draft','Done', 'Closed','Closed (unrelated)' ,'Canceled') and
    exists 
(
select 1
    from Assignment ass, AssignmentType ast
    where ass.[User] = @CurrentUserId and
        ass.DocumentOid = j.Oid and
        ass.AssignmentType = ast.Oid AND
        ast.Name in ('Responsible', 'Requester')
)
    /*[DateFilter]*/ and j.AgreedDateUtc >= @FromDate and j.AgreedDateUtc <= @ToDate/*[/DateFilter]*/
order by Days Asc","mapping":""} } ,"QueryConfiguration":{} } ]
